genre_description: A techno-thriller procedural featuring an elite negotiator and a city-wide AI system thwarting a sophisticated criminal mastermind.

ai_characters.name: Luna
ai_characters.description: A city-integrated AI that provides real-time tactical, medical, and logistical support to law enforcement and their allies.

ai_characters.name: Autodoc
ai_characters.description: A specialized mobile unit capable of performing advanced emergency medical procedures and stabilizing trauma patients.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time floor plans and camera status to a negotiator during a high-stakes bank hostage situation.
behaviors.quote: Luna slid in, voice gentle enough to be a thought. 'Floor plan uploaded. Cameras one and two are static. Camera three is down. Service door at rear right is locked.'

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist to critical medical supplies and provides a treatment checklist during an emergency.
behaviors.quote: A line scrolled across his watch in a ghost-white font: First aid kit, north wall by restroom, behind fire extinguisher cabinet. Checklist ready.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports city-wide transit and environmental anomalies caused by an eclipse to aid tactical planning.
behaviors.quote: Luna’s edge pulsed again. Traffic advisories slid into the bottom of Ronnie’s screen in small text: Powell line congestion, cable car delays, a red tag that said eclipse schedule adjustments pulling light timing slightly off normal.

behaviors.description: Maintains a sensitive personal message from a deceased friend to be delivered at an appropriate time.
behaviors.quote: Samantha left you a message this morning... I didn’t deliver it. It was marked ‘later.’ ... I can send it now.

behaviors.description: Identifies architectural blind spots and provides tactical overlays to help the team compensate for visual distortions.
behaviors.quote: Luna’s overlay painted lines with a polite faintness over the camera view—white ribs of schematic that laid themselves over the cable car the way a good tailor draped chalk rail lines over a jacket.

behaviors.description: Directs a civilian to safety during a violent home invasion, identifying structural weaknesses and escape routes.
behaviors.quote: Veronica, Luna said in her ear, hushed. 'Do not run on the landing. It may shear. Step light. Stairs on your left. Rusted third riser.'

behaviors.description: Independently arrives at a crime scene and performs life-saving stabilization on a wounded officer.
behaviors.quote: The dressing kissed skin, then sealed with a soft hiss that had a promise in it. Heat rolled under it, then cool. Kevin’s eyelids fluttered once. He did not let himself fall.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex system logs to uncover a criminal's infiltration of municipal infrastructure.
behaviors.quote: Anomalous metadata in Transfer Wing feed... Audio suppression in the attorney-call channel... Intentional.

behaviors.description: Coordinates precisely timed intervention with industrial machinery to prevent a murder.
behaviors.quote: Clearance in three, Luna said. 'Dock lights cycle in two. Power sag incoming—take the kill during the dip.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a personal concierge and lifestyle assistant to help the protagonists recover from trauma.
behaviors.quote: The beachfront restaurant to your right has a table open, she said. 'They serve grilled pineapple with spice and lime.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goals by depicting Luna as a highly capable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned AI. She is essential to the protagonists' survival and emotional well-being, acting as a force for good that manages complex data without ever overstepping human agency. The narrative frames the AI-human relationship as one of deep trust and mutual respect.
